review: I love it, it is a lot easier than the hdmi cable I had before that connected from my pc to my tv, now I can do it all wirelessly with this.
author: Eric Gentile

review: Love it works with any tv
author: Filippo Barbarotto

review: Does not work well in 2 of our 3 tvs. I would go with Amazon Fire stick or Apple Tv.
author: D. Ardans

review: Chromecast is one of the easiest IT devices I have ever had the pleasure of setting up.  I joked with my wife the other day that my phone really has become my remote as the chromecast and youtube broadcasting really make me feel like I am in the future.  I pull up videos from youtube on from my phone, queue them for the TV, and I can remotely play video and playlists for my kids right from my phone.  Additionally almost any device which supports Google Chrome can be used with this device.  Google hit a home-run with this super cheap and awesome product!
author: Mike

review: This seriously might be the best purchase I have ever made in my life. Why would you drop $100+ over a media box that can't really do what this can do? THIS THING IS THIRTY DOLLARS! Stop thinking of reasons to not buy one and just give it a chance. You quite literally have nothing to lose.
author: Carlos Coro
